column5: Well the Grand in the KW Cambridge area was still high and chocolaty so i figured why waste my time for bass.  I'd try my luck in the upper grand. (Elora)  At least there I have a chance of catching something.  The scenery is just awesome. If you have not fished this area then you should.  It's one of the nicest spots in southern Ontario. Anyways I lost 5 and landed one bow and one brown.  Lots of fun.
